pages.text: Parties are a group of players that can not attack eachother share resources and claims.

pages.title: your first party
pages.text: creating parties is done through the $(thing)/openpac-parties$() command. $(br2)To create a party type: $(br)$(thing)/openpac-parties create [name]$()$(br2)To invite to a party type: $(br)$(thing)/openpac-parties invite [name]$()$(br2)To ask to join a party type: $(br)$(thing)/openpac-parties join [name]$()
